name: Annotate Bacterial Genome
description: Annotate a bacterial genome using Prokka to identify genes, proteins, and functional features
run: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni /tmp/biomni && pip install -q -e /tmp/biomni && python /mnt/code/annotate_bacterial_genome.py

fields.name: genome_file_path
fields.description: Path to the assembled genome sequence file in FASTA format

fields.name: output_dir
fields.description: Directory where annotation results will be saved
